data.title: PSE Film School
data.text:
Courses

Bachelor 1 is a common core on every topic related to audio-visual industry (camera, lighting, sound recording, photography, graphic design, history of cinema, basics of production, cine-club, editing...)

Bachelor 2 is the time for students to choose from one of our 2 specialization:

Cinematography (Camera, lighting, sound, film production management...)

Post-production (Editing on several software, color grading, sound...)

Bachelor 3 have only one semester divided in 2 terms of 3 months:

First term to produce a short film of professional level made by all the year 3 students

Second term to complete an internship in an audio-visual company (production, TV, postproduction facility, etc)

Partners and Instructors

Thanks to Arthur Cloquet (DOP) and Albert Oriol (Academic advisor), a partnership with ENS Louis Lumière Film School in Paris was built between 2014 and 2022. During this period, they helped PSE Film School grow by providing an important support on different aspects such as curriculum development or skills referent trainers.

Since 2023, a new partnership has started with ESRA Film School in Brussels to continue helping Film School to thrive.

Many film experts and film makers visited us in Cambodia for trainings, workshops sharing sessions or masterclasses:

Events

French Film Days of Phnom Penh I and II

The French Film Days of Phnom Penh event took place from July 09 to 13, 2019 and from October 28 to November 4, 2022.

The filmmaker Claire Denis was the guest of honor of the first edition, Claire Simon, Kim Chapiron and Arthur Harari were guests of honor of the second edition.

Discover the event on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/ljdff/
